primaryPhoto.description:
Step inside an absurd carnival this summer as Shakespeare’s vicious comedy THE TAMING OF THE SHREW arrives in Shakespeare’s Globe Theatre.
Bianca isn’t allowed to marry until her older sister Katherina is wedded. But what will it take for a man to mould this fiercely independent woman into a wife? Following 2022’s ‘brilliantly provocative’ ★★★★ (The Guardian) Titus Andronicus, Jude Christian debuts in the Globe Theatre directing Shakespeare’s cutting, provocative exploration of gender stereotypes and expectations, asking us where we draw the line between entertainment and complicity, reality and the absurd?
‘For I am born to tame you, Kate,
And bring you from a wild Kate to a Kate
Comfortable as other household Kates.’
– Act II, scene 1
Book your THE TAMING OF THE SHREW theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
